content: Could we, in the parser for the new asm!, detect an invocation that includes a : immediately after the string, and give an error message that guides people to llvm_asm! (and to converting to the new asm!)?
The parser should have no trouble noticing the :, and that would make for much more friendly and helpful error messages.
Sure! I think that should be pretty easy to do.
Thanks! I think that would really help in the transition, and I appreciate you being receptive to it.
In fact I'm writing the parser right now.
